globalProperty.description: When uploading an XSN, this url is used as the "base path". (Should be something like http://localhost:8080/openmrs)
The text seen in the infopath taskpane upon first logging in

This property should point to a filesystem directory. If undefined (empty), XSNs will not be archived. If the directory is defined and available, every time an XSN is uploaded the old XSN will be renamed and copied to this directory.
The number of seconds between taskpane refreshes. This keeps the taskpane from logging people out on longer forms
The number of minutes to keep refreshing the taskpane before allowing the login to lapse
'true' means have the browser go back to the find patient page after picking a form from the patientForms tab on the patient dashboard page
Directory containing the formentry queue items. This will contain xml files submitted by infopath. These items are awaiting processing to be turned into hl7 queue items

Directory containing the formentry archive items. This will contain xml files that have been submitted by infopath and then processed sucessfully into hl7. Certain date parameters will be replaced with the current date: %Y = four digit year %M = two digit month %D = two digit date of the month %w = week of the year %W = week of the month
When you view the 'users.htm' page in the taskpane, i.e. by clicking on the Choose a Provider button, should the system automatically preload a list of all users?
